name: nodejs-mongodb-docker
description: Simple API in NodeJS connecting with MongoDB running in Docker

scripts.build-db: docker pull mongo && docker container run --name mongodb --publish 27017:27017 --detach mongo
scripts.build-app: docker image build -t node-mongo . && docker container run --name nodeapi --publish 8081:8085 node-mongo
scripts.build: npm run build-db && npm run build-app

author: Rodrigo Bernardi
